forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. Southwest wind 7 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn unfurls over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle warmth begins to replace the cooler embrace of the night. The low-hanging clouds that lingered earlier make way for a reassuring clarity, revealing a luminous blue sky overhead. The forecast hints at a pleasant day ahead, with temperatures climbing to a comfortable warmth, ideal for leisurely strolls along the Embarcadero or a midday picnic in one of the city’s many parks. The southwest winds, playful yet steady, brush through the streets, drawing back the curtain on a vibrant urban landscape.

Though the morning air may carry a cool whisper, especially along the waterfront, it is a fleeting chill, nudged aside by the sun’s gentle rise. To navigate the day successfully, a light jacket or cardigan would be a wise choice for the early hours, soon to be shed as the sun’s golden rays take command. This is a time for savoring the small pleasures, whether it be catching up with friends over coffee in an inviting café or wandering through the artistic streets of the Mission District. With the marine layer retreating, the city is looking not only charming but also eager to share its secrets.
